meta.about: Frances Hui has been an active participant of social movements in HK and has taken a distinctive role in recent protests. She focuses her reporting on Hong Kong-related topics, primarily feature stories about identity complexity and local cultures of HK.

meta.name: Frances Hui
meta.about:
Currently living in exile, I am one of a lot of Hongkongers who have to leave home from political persecution. I hope to share with you my life as an overseas Hongkonger, and bring you to get to know hong kong from on-the-ground culture to intense news and politics.
